content: बल् {vI.v} {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (बलति) {@--1@} To breathe or live. {@--2@} To hoard grain. {vII.v} {c1c} <ab>U.</ab> (बलति-ते) {@--1@} To give. {@--2@} To hurt, injure, kill. {@--3@} To speak. {@--4@} To see, mark. {vIII.v} {c10c} <ab>U.</ab> (बलयति-ते) To live. {vIV.v} {c10c} <ab>A.</ab> (बालयते) To describe. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (बालयति-ते) To nourish, support.
